### 1.表格控件

地址:软件内>示例代码>界面控件>表格控件

**示例:**

```js
"ui";  //这里需要带上;

ui.layout(
    <vertical>
        <input text="aaa"></input>
        {/* spanCount 一行几个 */}
        <grid id='gr' spanCount="4"  h="*" w="*">
            <img w="40" tint="red" h="40" src="{{this}}"/>
            <input text="aaa"></input>
        </grid>
    </vertical>
);

var src=['https://www.baidu.com/img/bd_logo1.png',
         
'data:image/png;base64,',
         
'data:image/png;base64,',
         
         
'data:image/png;base64,',
         
'data:image/png;base64,',
         
'data:image/png;base64,',
         
         
'data:image/png;base64,'
]// 遍历数组,渲染出来
ui.gr.setDataSource(src)
ui.gr.on('item_click',()=>{
    toast('点击')
})

toast('启动')


```
